website_summaries.verdict: This knife gets high marks for its durability, performance, and ergonomic design.
pros: With a blade made of high-carbon German steel, this knife really holds its razor-sharp edge
Its full tang and contoured, triple-riveted pakkawood handle give it easy maneuverability, comfort, and reassuring heft
The speared end makes it especially useful for transferring those thin slices of tomato from cutting board to burger or plate
cons: The only real con is that this knife is twice the price of most of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this knife because I had read such great things about this brand. I don't know if mine is defective, but it is so rough it sounds like sandpaper going through a tomato. It' doesn't slice nicely, it smashes and shreds the tomatoes. I am so disappointed with this knife, and if I could give it no stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rips your tomatoes - don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I had not bought this knife. It rips through the tomatoes rather than cut them. It also makes the tomato mushy once you've cut through it. If you are making something that you want to look nice or have a nice consistency to your raw tomatoes, this is not the knife for you. It would probably be ok if you are going to cook the tomatoes instead of leaving them raw. In the year and a half since I bought it, I dislike it even more.
customer_reviews.author: B.girl

customer_reviews.title: Best knives - I want them all!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought be the knife block for Christmas and I was ABSOLUTELY AMAZED at how wonderful the knives were. The sharpness, precision and weight is unparalleled by any other manufacturer, and the price is amazing for the high quality knives you receive. There were even a couple knives in the block set which I had not owned in the past that I never knew I needed so much - haha!! (Especially the kiritsuke) Since then I have purchased additional knives to add to the set both in the Gladiator as well as the Shogun Series. I have recommended these to many of my friends and family...thank you Dalstrong!!
customer_reviews.author: MRS. Ski

customer_reviews.title: I now have 14 of their knives and I'm pleased and impressed with all of them
customer_reviews.text: in my experience,this knife is another example ofDalstrongs commitment to quality, value customer service, I now have 14 of their knives and I'm pleased and impressed with all of them!!
customer_reviews.author: John R George

customer_reviews.title: within a few weeks I couldn't cut a tomato with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my third tomato knife (I leave them at rental houses) and my first Dalstrong- would NOT recommend it. Most importantly, within a few weeks I noticed that with delicate tomatoes, it wouldn't slice them without smashing them- isn't that the point of a tomato knife? It is quite big, heavy...more for a man's fingers, too. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not a slicer but a ripper
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't slice tomatoes so much as rip them. It's like someone copied the look of a tomato knife without copying its function. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for a Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of Dalstrong Steak Knives and they are amazing, incredibly well built, beautiful, feel substantial to hold and hold a razor sharp edge. The Tomato Knife is a must for every kitchen for prepping fruits and vegetables. Easily slices even tough skinned tomatoes near paper thin. Planning to buy more as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Reuven

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife, well balanced and feels great in the hand. The knife came beautifully packaged and well presented!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Global Knife customer for years. Decided to try something new (less expensive). This is a wonderful tomato knife. Feels great in your hand, slices well, a pleasure to use. Customer service from Dalstrong is professional and thorough. I had a shipping problem through no fault of theirs, but customer service made things right for me! The knife comes packaged in a really nice box with added touches - would make a great gift. I am thinking of getting the filet knife next. Really, really pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Knife for a Bartender
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is a bartender, bought her a victorionox utility knife for work, but the edge never kept for very long, had to use my whetstones every two weeks or so. But, this slices through everything with ease, and helps pack blue cheese in olives really well!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: OK - I guess.
customer_reviews.text: It takes excessive pressure to break the skin of the tomato, squashing the tomato in the process. I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: B. MccAhill

customer_reviews.title: Why do I need a tomato knife
customer_reviews.text: Never had one before, now that I own one can't live without. The brand will not disappoint either.
customer_reviews.author: jeff w

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cutting action
customer_reviews.text: I have Dalstrong utility knife that I really like however this knife is horrible, it doesn’t slice so much as rips. Feels solid in the hand but it’s all downhill from there.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Begley

customer_reviews.title: great knife
customer_reviews.text: got this for my daughter who loves tomatoes but no great knife to cut them with. I already owned one so knew she would love it and she does
customer_reviews.author: vicky Manson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality! Amazing staff!
customer_reviews.text: Such amazing craftmanship and quality. I couldn't be happier. And their customer service is amazing. This will be the only company I purchase knives from.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Cordle

customer_reviews.title: A quality knife in every detail!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful, strong, well balanced knife. I have never experienced one with such a natural grip - l cut up a whole pot of vegetables with ease. I, also, wish to compliment the package designer, such a nice presentation box. I intend to wear the pin at my next dinner party for fun!
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast and quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Great knife works well on tomatoes as it should. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality knife, but not for tomatoes. The serrations are too small and the knife does more sawing than slicing. An excellent steak knife.
customer_reviews.author: D. E Summers

customer_reviews.title: Love This Knife
customer_reviews.text: Just as describe in description. Great for cutting the thinnest tomatoes,onions this knife is meant for this
customer_reviews.author: Danny E. Iversen

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: This makes adding tomato to a sandwich Or burger foolproof
customer_reviews.author: JPP

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as Christmas present for my husband. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as Christmas present for my husband. He loves the knife and uses it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Very good knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking knife. that came extremely sharp. It's my 5th Dalstrong knife, they have all been very good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cook

customer_reviews.title: Well-balanced and effective
customer_reviews.text: This knife is comfortable to use and works well. The strong sheath is great for drawer storage.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Nevas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and by far the best knife I own
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and by far the best knife I own! I love it so much that I am considering purchasing more knives from Dalstrong. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisophist

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife! Works great and the packaging made it look like a $100 knife!
customer_reviews.author: Paula M.

customer_reviews.title: nice touch.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know I needed a tomato knife until I used one for the first time. The fork tine on the blade side has an edge for coring; nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Zbignew

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife. It is just what I have been looking for. Cuts tomatoes and bread without crushing. Ended up giving it to my sister and am going to get another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda C.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great blade as well as it beautiful balance of it
customer_reviews.author: Austin Steinke Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great balance
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Christmas and my wife loves it the handle fit her hand perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't slice tomatoes as good as I think it should.
customer_reviews.text: The knife is good. It doesn't slice as good as I expected though.
customer_reviews.author: B.D. Millican, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: super tomatoe knife Just what I had hoped for Thank ...
customer_reviews.text: Exquisitely packaging, super tomatoe knife Just what I had hoped for Thank you, a cut above !
customer_reviews.author: ostling stephen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome knife...fairly priced and delivered quickly...happy to add it to my cutlery too box...THANX A BUNCH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Soupyet

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: This knife is handsome and practical - good weight in the hand and sliced my tomatoes like butter. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife that came in a very fancy box with extras (not necessary) Got the knife out to use and the rivets were not polished down and the wood grip was splintered. The blade was too 'ragged'. It would not give a nice thin slice. I could never use because of all these quality issues. Too bad
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It does a super job
customer_reviews.text: I love it . It does a super job !
customer_reviews.author: JOY FRIEDRICH

customer_reviews.title: Not Dalstrong's best blade...but they took care of their customer.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too crazy about this knife. I own 5 other Dalstrong knives and I love them. This knife's blade doesn't taper in width and it just doesn't feel great in the hand. Handle feels too small for the length of the blade. It cuts okay, but just doesn't 'feel right'. That said, I still like Dalstrong knives, just not this one so much. Might be better if it had the 'Phantom Series' handle and a tapered blade, perhaps. Update: Their customer service is top-notch, and they took care of it. End of story!
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Slicer!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is terrific as a tomato and general vegetable slicer. I purchased it for my wife and she loves it. It is a quality knife that should provide many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't slice through the skin as smoothly as I had hoped. Slices have raggedy edges.
customer_reviews.author: K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality knife but the serrations are too steep. The knife grabs the tomato skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Woudn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: not sharp, feels cheap. Very short valid return period. Now I'm stuck with a poor quality product. I wish I had spent more money in a better product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bejar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cutlery. I have a 22 year old set ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cutlery. I have a 22 year old set of Wustof knives that I.psid $1,299.00 for and still.eotk great. But I liked the look and feel.of these Dalstrong knives so much I bought one. That turned into buying a complete set. LOVE these knives.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Swartz

product_meta.title: DALSTRONG Tomato Slicer Knife - Gladiator Series - German HC Steel - 5" - Serrated Utility - Sheath
feature_bullets: Outstanding craftsmanship, cutting-edge technology, stunning design elements, and premium materials. Peak performance has never looked so good at this price.
Incredibly razor sharp, full-tang, imported high-carbon German steel with a hand polished edge at 14-16 degrees. Precisely tempered and stain resistant.

Award winning design, with satisfying heft, premium materials and quality feel. Luxury imported black pakkawood handle is triple-riveted with a grip that ensures comfort and maneuverability. Laminated and polished for a sanitary build, perfect for busy kitchens

Engineered to perfection at 56+ Rockwell hardness and hand polished to a satin finish. Carefully tapered for improved hardness, flexibility, and minimal slicing resistance. Tall blade height provides useful knuckle clearance.
See why over seventy-five thousand professional chefs and home cooks love and trust the DALSTRONG DIFFERENCE. 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free, we know you'll love it!

specifications.Color: Forged Thyssenkrupp High-carbon German Steel, Satin Finish Hand-sharpened Blade, Black Pakkawood Handle, Full Tang, Engraved Rivet, Lifetime Warranty, Dalstrong Support, Included Guard. Ice Tempered & Heat Treated
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars97 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
